title: LawThinker: A Deep Research Legal Agent in Dynamic Environments

problem_definition.statement: 법적 추론에서 중간 추론 단계의 검증 메커니즘이 부족하여 잘못된 법령 인용과 같은 오류가 추론 체인에 전파되는 문제를 해결하고자 합니다.
problem_definition.structural_limitation: 기존 방법들은 중간 단계의 정확성과 관련성을 검증하지 않고, 최종 결과의 정확성에만 의존합니다.

evidence.quote: existing methods lack mechanisms to verify intermediate reasoning steps, allowing errors such as inapplicable statute citations to propagate undetected through the reasoning chain.

baselines.name: Direct Reasoning
baselines.description: 모델의 내부 지식에만 의존하여 법적 추론을 수행하는 방법
baselines.limitation: 법적 조항을 조작하거나 잘못된 법령 번호를 매칭하는 등 심각한 환각 문제가 발생합니다.

evidence.quote: Direct Reasoning exhibits consistently limited performance across all tasks, with particularly poor results in more complex scenarios.

baselines.name: Workflow-based Methods
baselines.description: 외부 지식을 통합하여 작업을 수행하는 방법
baselines.limitation: 명시적인 검증 메커니즘이 없어 절차적 준수 점수가 낮습니다.

evidence.quote: Workflow-based Methods outperform direct reasoning by incorporating external knowledge, but their gains are constrained by the absence of explicit verification mechanisms.

method_components.name: Explore-Verify-Memorize Strategy
method_components.description: 지식 탐색과 검증을 시스템 수준에서 원자적 작업으로 처리하는 전략

evidence.quote: The central design principle is to treat knowledge exploration and verification as an enforced atomic operation at the system level.

method_components.name: DeepVerifier
method_components.description: 각 탐색 결과의 정확성, 사실-법 관련성, 절차적 준수를 검증하는 모듈

evidence.quote: The DeepVerifier selects and invokes verification tools along three dimensions that correspond to the core requirements of legal reasoning.

method_components.name: Memory Module
method_components.description: 검증된 법적 지식과 주요 사건 컨텍스트를 저장하여 장기 상호작용 작업을 지원

evidence.quote: The memory module maintains two categories of content: Legal Knowledge Memory and Case Context Memory.

baseline_results.Workflow-based Methods: 13% improvement in overall accuracy compared to direct reasoning

proposed_results.LawThinker: 24% improvement over direct reasoning and an 11% gain over workflow-based methods

evidence.quote: LawThinker achieves a 24% improvement over direct reasoning and an 11% gain over workflow-based methods.

claims.text: LawThinker는 동적 사법 환경에서 탐색-검증-기억 전략을 채택하여 기존 방법보다 우수한 성능을 보입니다.

evidence.quote: To address these limitations, we propose LawThinker, an autonomous legal research agent designed for dynamic judicial environments.

claims.text: LawThinker는 절차적 준수와 법적 추론의 정확성을 크게 향상시킵니다.

evidence.quote: LawThinker achieves a 24% improvement over direct reasoning and an 11% gain over workflow-based methods, with particularly strong performance on process-oriented metrics.

claims.text: LawThinker는 다양한 법적 시나리오에 적응할 수 있는 능력을 보여줍니다.

evidence.quote: LawThinker demonstrates robust performance across judicial environments ranging from inquiry to adjudication.
